short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatic form filler that fills out all form fields with random data in just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Designed for developers and QA testers, Easy Test Form Filler is here to help you save time by automating form filling process with just one click. This tool effortlessly populates all form fields and inputs on any web page with random data.

Key Features:

1. Easy Setup - No complex setup or configuration required, simply install the extension and enjoy instant accessibility.

2. Smart Form Filling - It fills out different types of form fields like text, email, password, radio, check boxes, select and more without needing your input.

3. Save Time - Get more done by letting the extension handle repetitive tasks. It speeds up testing and development by filling forms automatically.
